title: 104_hr2512
content: Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1996 - Establishes in the Treasury the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund, which shall: (1) receive funds from the Missouri River basin Pick-Sloan program until a specified Fund aggregate is attained. And (2) be used for the socioeconomic recovery and cultural preservation of the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe . Authorizes appropriations.
